name: Custom Sports

api_list.name: get Teams info
Get Teams
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://custom-sports.p.rapidapi.com/nfl-team-listing/v1/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "custom-sports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
